name: Refaster template `AssertJThrowingCallableRules.AssertThatThrownByNullPointerExceptionHasMessageStartingWith`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatThrownByNullPointerExceptionHasMessageStartingWith {          @BeforeTemplate     @SuppressWarnings(value = "AssertThatThrownByNullPointerException")     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> before(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable String message) {         return assertThatNullPointerException().isThrownBy(throwingCallable).withMessageStartingWith(message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable String message) {         return assertThatThrownBy(throwingCallable).isInstanceOf(NullPointerException.class).hasMessageStartingWith(message);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `AssertJThrowingCallableRules.AssertThatThrownByNullPointerException`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatThrownByNullPointerException {          @BeforeTemplate     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> before(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable) {         return assertThatNullPointerException().isThrownBy(throwingCallable);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable) {         return assertThatThrownBy(throwingCallable).isInstanceOf(NullPointerException.class);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `AssertJThrowingCallableRules.AssertThatThrownByNullPointerExceptionRootCauseHasMessage`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatThrownByNullPointerExceptionRootCauseHasMessage {          @BeforeTemplate     @SuppressWarnings(value = "AssertThatThrownByNullPointerException")     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> before(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable String message) {         return assertThatNullPointerException().isThrownBy(throwingCallable).havingRootCause().withMessage(message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable String message) {         return assertThatThrownBy(throwingCallable).isInstanceOf(NullPointerException.class).rootCause().hasMessage(message);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `AssertJThrowingCallableRules.AssertThatThrownByRootCauseHasMessage`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatThrownByRootCauseHasMessage {          @BeforeTemplate     @SuppressWarnings(value = "AssertThatThrownByAsInstanceOfThrowable")     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> before(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable Class<? extends Throwable> exceptionType String message) {         return assertThatExceptionOfType(exceptionType).isThrownBy(throwingCallable).havingRootCause().withMessage(message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     AbstractObjectAssert<? ?> after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable Class<? extends Throwable> exceptionType String message) {         return assertThatThrownBy(throwingCallable).isInstanceOf(exceptionType).rootCause().hasMessage(message);     } } ``` .

name: `AssortedRules` Refaster recipes
description: Assorted Refaster rules that do not (yet) belong in one of the other classes with more topical Refaster rules. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/AssortedRules).

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.CheckIndex`
description: Prefer `Objects#checkIndex(int int)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.DisjointCollections`
description: Don't unnecessarily copy collections before passing them to `Collections#disjoint(Collection Collection)`.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.DisjointSets`
description: Prefer `Collections#disjoint(Collection Collection)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.IterableIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `Iterables#isEmpty(Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.IteratorGetNextOrDefault`
description: Prefer `Iterators#getNext(Iterator Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.LogicalImplication`
description: Don't unnecessarily repeat boolean expressions.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.SplitToStream`
description: Prefer `Splitter#splitToStream(CharSequence)` over less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `AssortedRules.UnboundedSingleElementStream`
description: Prefer `Stream#generate(java.util.function.Supplier)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: `BigDecimalRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `BigDecimal`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/BigDecimalRules).

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalOne`
description: Prefer using the constant `BigDecimal#ONE` when possible.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalSignumIsNegative`
description: Prefer a `BigDecimal#signum()` comparison to -1 over more contrived or less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalSignumIsPositive`
description: Prefer a `BigDecimal#signum()` comparison to 1 over more contrived or less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalSignumIsZero`
description: Prefer using `BigDecimal#signum()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalTen`
description: Prefer using the constant `BigDecimal#TEN` when possible.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalValueOf`
description: Prefer `BigDecimal#valueOf(double)` over the associated constructor.

name: Refaster template `BigDecimalRules.BigDecimalZero`
description: Prefer using the constant `BigDecimal#ZERO` when possible.

name: `BugCheckerRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to `com.google.errorprone.bugpatterns.BugChecker` classes. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/BugCheckerRules).

name: Refaster template `BugCheckerRules.BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelperAddInputLinesExpectUnchanged`
description: Prefer `BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper.ExpectOutput#expectUnchanged()` over repeating the input.

name: Refaster template `BugCheckerRules.BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelperIdentity`
description: Avoid calling `BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper#setFixChooser(FixChooser)` or `BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper#setImportOrder(String)` with their respective default values.

name: Refaster template `BugCheckerRules.NameContentEquals`
description: Prefer `Name#contentEquals(CharSequence)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: `CharSequenceRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `CharSequence`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/CharSequenceRules).

name: Refaster template `CharSequenceRules.CharSequenceIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `CharSequence#isEmpty()` over alternatives that consult the char sequence's length.

name: `ClassRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with classes. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ClassRules).

name: Refaster template `ClassRules.ClassIsInstance`
description: Prefer `Class#isInstance(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ClassRules.ClassReferenceCast`
description: Prefer `Class#cast(Object)` method references over lambda expressions that require naming a variable.

name: Refaster template `ClassRules.ClassReferenceIsInstancePredicate`
description: Prefer `Class#isInstance(Object)` method references over lambda expressions that require naming a variable.

name: `CollectionRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with (arbitrary) collections. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/CollectionRules).

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionAddAllToCollectionExpression`
description: Don't call `Iterables#addAll(Collection Iterable)` when the elements to be added are already part of a `Collection`.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionContains`
description: Prefer `Collection#contains(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionForEach`
description: Prefer `Collection#forEach(Consumer)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `Collection#isEmpty()` over alternatives that consult the collection's size or are otherwise more contrived.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionIterator`
description: Prefer `Collection#iterator()` over more contrived or less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionRemoveAllFromCollectionExpression`
description: Don't call `Iterables#removeAll(Iterable Collection)` when the elements to be removed are already part of a `Collection`.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionSize`
description: Prefer `Collection#size()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.CollectionToArray`
description: Prefer calling `Collection#toArray()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionAsList`
description: Prefer `ImmutableCollection#asList()` over the more verbose alternative.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionContains`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if `Collection#contains(Object)` is called on the result; call it directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionParallelStream`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if `ImmutableCollection#parallelStream()` is called on the result; call it directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionStream`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if the result is going to be streamed; stream directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionToArrayWithArray`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if `ImmutableCollection#toArray(Object[])`` is called on the result; call it directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionToArrayWithGenerator`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if `ImmutableCollection#toArray(IntFunction)`} is called on the result; call it directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.ImmutableCollectionToString`
description: Don't call `ImmutableCollection#asList()` if `ImmutableCollection#toString()` is called on the result; call it directly.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.NewArrayListFromCollection`
description: Prefer `ArrayList#ArrayList(Collection)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.OptionalFirstCollectionElement`
description: Don't use the ternary operator to extract the first element of a possibly-empty `Collection` as an `Optional` and (when applicable) prefer `Stream#findFirst()` over `Stream#findAny()` to communicate that the collection's first element (if any according to iteration order) will be returned.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.RemoveOptionalFirstNavigableSetElement`
description: Avoid contrived constructions when extracting the first element from a possibly empty `NavigableSet`.

name: Refaster template `CollectionRules.SetStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily call `Stream#distinct()` on an already-unique stream of elements.

name: `ComparatorRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `Comparator`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ComparatorRules).

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CollectionsMax`
description: Prefer `Collections#max(Collection)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CollectionsMaxWithComparator`
description: Avoid unnecessary creation of a `Stream` to determine the maximum of a known collection of values.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CollectionsMin`
description: Prefer `Collections#min(Collection)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CollectionsMinWithComparator`
description: Avoid unnecessary creation of a `Stream` to determine the minimum of a known collection of values.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CollectionsSort`
description: Prefer `Collections#sort(List)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ComparatorsMax`
description: Prefer a method reference to `Comparators#max(Comparable Comparable)` over calling `BinaryOperator#minBy(Comparator)` with `Comparator#naturalOrder()`.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ComparatorsMin`
description: Prefer a method reference to `Comparators#min(Comparable Comparable)` over calling `BinaryOperator#minBy(Comparator)` with `Comparator#naturalOrder()`.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.CompareTo`
description: Prefer `Comparable#compareTo(Object)`} over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.IsLessThanOrEqualTo`
description: Don't explicitly compare enums by their ordinal.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.IsLessThan`
description: Don't explicitly compare enums by their ordinal.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.MaxByNaturalOrder`
description: Prefer `Comparator#naturalOrder()` over `Comparator#reverseOrder()` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.MaxOfArray`
description: Avoid unnecessary creation of a `Stream` to determine the maximum of a known collection of values.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.MinByNaturalOrder`
description: Prefer `Comparator#naturalOrder()` over `Comparator#reverseOrder()` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.MinOfArray`
description: Avoid unnecessary creation of a `Stream` to determine the minimum of a known collection of values.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ReverseOrder`
description: Prefer `Comparator#reverseOrder()` over more complicated constructs.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingCustom`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingCustomReversed`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingDouble`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingInt`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingLong`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparing`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: Refaster template `ComparatorRules.ThenComparingReversed`
description: Don't explicitly create `Comparator`s unnecessarily.

name: `DoubleStreamRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `DoubleStream`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/DoubleStreamRules).

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.ConcatOneDoubleStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily call `Streams#concat(DoubleStream...)`.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.ConcatTwoDoubleStreams`
description: Prefer `DoubleStream#concat(DoubleStream DoubleStream)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamAllMatch`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class DoubleStreamAllMatch {          @BeforeTemplate     boolean before(DoubleStream stream DoublePredicate predicate) {         return stream.noneMatch(predicate.negate());     }          @AfterTemplate     boolean after(DoubleStream stream DoublePredicate predicate) {         return stream.allMatch(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamAnyMatch`
description: Prefer `DoubleStream#anyMatch(DoublePredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamFilterSorted`
description: Apply `DoubleStream#filter(DoublePredicate)` before `DoubleStream#sorted()` to reduce the number of elements to sort.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamIsEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamIsNotEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamMin`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class DoubleStreamMin {          @BeforeTemplate     OptionalDouble before(DoubleStream stream) {         return stream.sorted().findFirst();     }          @AfterTemplate     OptionalDouble after(DoubleStream stream) {         return stream.min();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamNoneMatch`
description: Prefer `DoubleStream#noneMatch(DoublePredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `DoubleStreamRules.DoubleStreamTakeWhile`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class DoubleStreamTakeWhile {          @BeforeTemplate     DoubleStream before(DoubleStream stream DoublePredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate).filter(predicate);     }          @AfterTemplate     DoubleStream after(DoubleStream stream DoublePredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: `EqualityRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with (in)equalities. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/EqualityRules).

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.DoubleNegation`
description: Avoid double negations; this is not Javascript.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.EnumReferenceEqualityLambda`
description: Prefer reference-based equality for enums.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.EnumReferenceEquality`
description: Prefer reference-based equality for enums.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.EqualsPredicate`
description: Prefer `Object#equals(Object)` over the equivalent lambda function.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.Equals`
description: Avoid contrived ways of handling `null` values during equality testing.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.IndirectDoubleNegation`
description: Don't negate an inequality test or use the ternary operator to compare two booleans; directly test for equality instead.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.Negation`
description: Don't negate an equality test or use the ternary operator to compare two booleans; directly test for inequality instead.

name: Refaster template `EqualityRules.ObjectsEquals`
description: Avoid contrived ways of handling `null` values during equality testing.

name: `FileRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with files. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/FileRules).

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FileMkDirsFileExists`
description: Invoke `File#mkdirs()` before `File#exists()` to avoid concurrency issues.

name: Prefer `Files#createTempFile(Path String String FileAttribute[])` over alternatives that create files with more liberal permissions
description: Note that `File#createTempFile` treats the given prefix as a path and ignores all but  its file name. That is the actual prefix used is derived from all characters following the  final file separator (if any). This is not the case with `Files#createTempFile` which  will instead throw an `IllegalArgumentException` if the prefix contains any file  separators.

name: Prefer `Files#createTempFile(String String FileAttribute[])` over alternatives that create files with more liberal permissions
description: Note that `File#createTempFile` treats the given prefix as a path and ignores all but  its file name. That is the actual prefix used is derived from all characters following the  final file separator (if any). This is not the case with `Files#createTempFile` which  will instead throw an `IllegalArgumentException` if the prefix contains any file  separators.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesNewBufferedReaderPathOf`
description: Prefer `Files#newBufferedReader(Path)` over more verbose or contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesNewBufferedReaderPathOfWithCharset`
description: Prefer `Files#newBufferedReader(Path Charset)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesNewBufferedReaderToPath`
description: Prefer `Files#newBufferedReader(Path)` over more verbose or contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesNewBufferedReaderToPathWithCharset`
description: Prefer `Files#newBufferedReader(Path Charset)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesReadString`
description: Prefer `Files#readString(Path)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.FilesReadStringWithCharset`
description: Prefer `Files#readString(Path Charset)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.PathInstance`
description: Avoid redundant conversions from `Path` to `File`.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.PathOfUri`
description: Prefer the more idiomatic `Path#of(URI)` over `Paths#get(URI)`.

name: Refaster template `FileRules.PathToFileMkDirsFilesExists`
description: Invoke `File#mkdirs()` before `Files#exists(Path LinkOption...)` to avoid concurrency issues.

name: `ImmutableEnumSetRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `com.google.common.collect.ImmutableEnumSet`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ImmutableEnumSetRules).

name: Refaster template `ImmutableEnumSetRules.SetsImmutableEnumSet1`
description: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the `ImmutableSet#of` expression produces a set that iterates over its elements in the listed order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the `ImmutableSet#of` expression produces a set that iterates over its elements in the listed order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the `ImmutableSet#of` expression produces a set that iterates over its elements in the listed order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the `ImmutableSet#of` expression produces a set that iterates over its elements in the listed order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Enum Enum[])` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the original code produces a set that iterates over its elements in the listed order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Iterable)` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the original code produces a set that iterates over its elements in the same order as defined in the array the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Prefer `Sets#immutableEnumSet(Iterable)` for enum collections to take advantage of the internally used `EnumSet`
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the original code produces a set that iterates over its elements in the same order as the input `Iterable` the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: Use `Sets#toImmutableEnumSet()` when possible as it is more efficient than `ImmutableSet#toImmutableSet()` and produces a more compact object
description: Warning: this rule is not completely behavior preserving: while the original code produces a set that iterates over its elements in encounter order the replacement code iterates over the elements in enum definition order.

name: `ImmutableListMultimapRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `ImmutableListMultimap`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ImmutableListMultimapRules).

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.EmptyImmutableListMultimap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableListMultimap#of()` over more contrived or less-specific alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.EntryToImmutableListMultimap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableListMultimap#of(Object Object)` over more contrived or less-specific alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.ImmutableListMultimapBuilder`
description: Prefer `ImmutableListMultimap#builder()` over the associated constructor on constructions that produce a less-specific type.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.IterableToImmutableListMultimap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableListMultimap#copyOf(Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.PairToImmutableListMultimap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableListMultimap#of(Object Object)` over more contrived or less-specific alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListMultimapRules.TransformMultimapValuesToImmutableListMultimap2`
description: Prefer creating an immutable copy of the result of `Multimaps#transformValues(Multimap com.google.common.base.Function)` over creating and directly collecting a stream.

name: `ImmutableListRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `ImmutableList`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ImmutableListRules).

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListBuilder`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#builder()` over the associated constructor.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf1`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of(Object)` over more contrived alternatives or alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf2`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of(Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf3`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of(Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf4`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of(Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf5`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of(Object Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListOf`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#of()` over more contrived alternatives or alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting list at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListSortedCopyOf`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#sortedCopyOf(Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.ImmutableListSortedCopyOfWithCustomComparator`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#sortedCopyOf(Comparator Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.IterableToImmutableList`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#copyOf(Iterable)` and variants over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.StreamToDistinctImmutableList`
description: Collecting to an `ImmutableSet` and converting the result to an `ImmutableList` may be more efficient than deduplicating a stream and collecting the result to an `ImmutableList`.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableListRules.StreamToImmutableList`
description: Prefer `ImmutableList#toImmutableList()` over less idiomatic alternatives.

name: `ImmutableMapRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `ImmutableMap`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ImmutableMapRules).

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.EntryIterableToImmutableMap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#copyOf(Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.EntryToImmutableMap`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapBuilderBuildOrThrow`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap.Builder#buildOrThrow()` over the less explicit `ImmutableMap.Builder#build()`.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapBuilder`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#builder()` over the associated constructor.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf1`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object)` over more contrived alternatives or alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf2`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf3`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf4`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object Object Object Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf5`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of(Object Object Object Object Object Object Object Object Object Object)` over alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMapRules.ImmutableMapOf`
description: Prefer `ImmutableMap#of()` over more contrived alternatives or alternatives that don't communicate the immutability of the resulting map at the type level.

name: Refaster template `ImmutableMultisetRules.StreamToImmutableMultiset`

name: Refaster template `ImmutableSetMultimapRules.ImmutableSetMultimapBuilder`

name: Refaster template `ImmutableSetMultimapRules.IterableToImmutableSetMultimap`

name: Refaster template `ImmutableSetMultimapRules.PairToImmutableSetMultimap`

name: `InputStreamRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `InputStream`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/InputStreamRules).

name: Refaster template `InputStreamRules.InputStreamReadAllBytes`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class InputStreamReadAllBytes {          @BeforeTemplate     byte[] before(InputStream in) throws IOException {         return ByteStreams.toByteArray(in);     }          @AfterTemplate     byte[] after(InputStream in) throws IOException {         return in.readAllBytes();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `InputStreamRules.InputStreamReadNBytes`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class InputStreamReadNBytes {          @BeforeTemplate     byte[] before(InputStream in int n) throws IOException {         return ByteStreams.limit(in n).readAllBytes();     }          @AfterTemplate     byte[] after(InputStream in int n) throws IOException {         return in.readNBytes(n);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `InputStreamRules.InputStreamSkipNBytes`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class InputStreamSkipNBytes {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(InputStream in long n) throws IOException {         ByteStreams.skipFully(in n);     }          @AfterTemplate     void after(InputStream in long n) throws IOException {         in.skipNBytes(n);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `InputStreamRules.InputStreamTransferTo`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class InputStreamTransferTo {          @BeforeTemplate     long before(InputStream in OutputStream out) throws IOException {         return ByteStreams.copy(in out);     }          @AfterTemplate     long after(InputStream in OutputStream out) throws IOException {         return in.transferTo(out);     } } ``` .

name: `IntStreamRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `IntStream`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/IntStreamRules).

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.ConcatOneIntStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily call `Streams#concat(IntStream...)`.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.ConcatTwoIntStreams`
description: Prefer `IntStream#concat(IntStream IntStream)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamAllMatch`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class IntStreamAllMatch {          @BeforeTemplate     boolean before(IntStream stream IntPredicate predicate) {         return stream.noneMatch(predicate.negate());     }          @AfterTemplate     boolean after(IntStream stream IntPredicate predicate) {         return stream.allMatch(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamAnyMatch`
description: Prefer `IntStream#anyMatch(IntPredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamClosedOpenRange`
description: Prefer `IntStream#range(int int)` over the more contrived alternative.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamFilterSorted`
description: Apply `IntStream#filter(IntPredicate)` before `IntStream#sorted()` to reduce the number of elements to sort.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamIsEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamIsNotEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamMin`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class IntStreamMin {          @BeforeTemplate     OptionalInt before(IntStream stream) {         return stream.sorted().findFirst();     }          @AfterTemplate     OptionalInt after(IntStream stream) {         return stream.min();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamNoneMatch`
description: Prefer `IntStream#noneMatch(IntPredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `IntStreamRules.IntStreamTakeWhile`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class IntStreamTakeWhile {          @BeforeTemplate     IntStream before(IntStream stream IntPredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate).filter(predicate);     }          @AfterTemplate     IntStream after(IntStream stream IntPredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster rules to replace JUnit assertions with AssertJ equivalents
description: Note that while both libraries throw an `AssertionError` in case of an assertion  failure the exact subtype used generally differs. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/JUnitToAssertJRules).

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatBooleanArrayContainsExactly`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatBooleanArrayContainsExactly {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(boolean[] actual boolean[] expected) {         assertArrayEquals(expected actual);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(boolean[] actual boolean[] expected) {         assertThat(actual).containsExactly(expected);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatBooleanArrayWithFailMessageContainsExactly`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatBooleanArrayWithFailMessageContainsExactly {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(boolean[] actual String message boolean[] expected) {         assertArrayEquals(expected actual message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(boolean[] actual String message boolean[] expected) {         assertThat(actual).withFailMessage(message).containsExactly(expected);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatBooleanArrayWithFailMessageSupplierContainsExactly`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatBooleanArrayWithFailMessageSupplierContainsExactly {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(boolean[] actual Supplier<String> message boolean[] expected) {         assertArrayEquals(expected actual message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(boolean[] actual Supplier<String> message boolean[] expected) {         assertThat(actual).withFailMessage(message).containsExactly(expected);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatByteArrayContainsExactly`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatByteArrayContainsExactly {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(byte[] actual byte[] expected) {         assertArrayEquals(expected actual);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(byte[] actual byte[] expected) {         assertThat(actual).containsExactly(expected);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatCodeDoesNotThrowAnyException`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatCodeDoesNotThrowAnyException {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(Executable throwingCallable) {         assertDoesNotThrow(throwingCallable);     }          @BeforeTemplate     void before(ThrowingSupplier<?> throwingCallable) {         assertDoesNotThrow(throwingCallable);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable) {         assertThatCode(throwingCallable).doesNotThrowAnyException();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `JUnitToAssertJRules.AssertThatCodeWithFailMessageStringDoesNotThrowAnyException`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class AssertThatCodeWithFailMessageStringDoesNotThrowAnyException {          @BeforeTemplate     void before(Executable throwingCallable String message) {         assertDoesNotThrow(throwingCallable message);     }          @BeforeTemplate     void before(ThrowingSupplier<?> throwingCallable String message) {         assertDoesNotThrow(throwingCallable message);     }          @AfterTemplate     @UseImportPolicy(value = STATIC_IMPORT_ALWAYS)     void after(ThrowingCallable throwingCallable String message) {         assertThatCode(throwingCallable).withFailMessage(message).doesNotThrowAnyException();     } } ``` .

name: `JacksonRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to Jackson expressions and statements. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/JacksonRules).

name: Refaster template `JacksonRules.JsonNodeOptionalInt`
description: Prefer `JsonNode#optional(int)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `JacksonRules.JsonNodeOptionalString`
description: Prefer `JsonNode#optional(String)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: `LongStreamRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `LongStream`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/LongStreamRules).

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.ConcatOneLongStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily call `Streams#concat(LongStream...)`.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.ConcatTwoLongStreams`
description: Prefer `LongStream#concat(LongStream LongStream)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamAllMatch`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class LongStreamAllMatch {          @BeforeTemplate     boolean before(LongStream stream LongPredicate predicate) {         return stream.noneMatch(predicate.negate());     }          @AfterTemplate     boolean after(LongStream stream LongPredicate predicate) {         return stream.allMatch(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamAnyMatch`
description: Prefer `LongStream#anyMatch(LongPredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamClosedOpenRange`
description: Prefer `LongStream#range(long long)` over the more contrived alternative.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamFilterSorted`
description: Apply `LongStream#filter(LongPredicate)` before `LongStream#sorted()` to reduce the number of elements to sort.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamIsEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamIsNotEmpty`
description: In order to test whether a stream has any element simply try to find one.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamMin`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class LongStreamMin {          @BeforeTemplate     OptionalLong before(LongStream stream) {         return stream.sorted().findFirst();     }          @AfterTemplate     OptionalLong after(LongStream stream) {         return stream.min();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamNoneMatch`
description: Prefer `LongStream#noneMatch(LongPredicate)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `LongStreamRules.LongStreamTakeWhile`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class LongStreamTakeWhile {          @BeforeTemplate     LongStream before(LongStream stream LongPredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate).filter(predicate);     }          @AfterTemplate     LongStream after(LongStream stream LongPredicate predicate) {         return stream.takeWhile(predicate);     } } ``` .

name: `MapEntryRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `Map.Entry` instances. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/MapEntryRules).

name: Refaster template `MapEntryRules.MapEntryComparingByKey`
description: Prefer `Map.Entry#comparingByKey()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapEntryRules.MapEntryComparingByKeyWithCustomComparator`
description: Prefer `Map.Entry#comparingByKey(Comparator)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapEntryRules.MapEntryComparingByValue`
description: Prefer `Map.Entry#comparingByValue()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapEntryRules.MapEntryComparingByValueWithCustomComparator`
description: Prefer `Map.Entry#comparingByValue(Comparator)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Prefer `Map#entry(Object Object)` over alternative ways to create an immutable map entry
description: Warning: while both `Maps#immutableEntry(Object Object)` and `AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry` allow `null` keys and values the preferred @link Map#entry(Object Object)} variant does not. Moreover the `Map.Entry` instances produced by the former approaches is `java.io.Serializable` while this does not hold for the object returned by the preferred approach.

name: `MapRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `Map` instances. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/MapRules).

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapContainsKey`
description: Prefer `Map#containsKey(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapContainsValue`
description: Prefer `Map#containsValue(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapGetOrDefault`
description: Prefer `Map#getOrDefault(Object Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapGetOrNull`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class MapGetOrNull<K V T> {          @BeforeTemplate     @Nullable     V before(Map<K V> map T key) {         return map.getOrDefault(key null);     }          @AfterTemplate     @Nullable     V after(Map<K V> map T key) {         return map.get(key);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `Map#isEmpty()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapKeyStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily use `Map#entrySet()`.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapSize`
description: Prefer `Map#size()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MapRules.MapValueStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily use `Map#entrySet()`.

name: Refaster template `MicrometerRules.TagsOf1`
description: Prefer using `Tags` over other immutable collections.

description: Prefer using `Tags` over other immutable collections.

name: `MockitoRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to Mockito expressions and statements. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/MockitoRules).

name: Refaster template `MockitoRules.InvocationOnMockGetArguments`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class InvocationOnMockGetArguments {          @BeforeTemplate     Object before(InvocationOnMock invocation int i) {         return invocation.getArguments()[i];     }          @AfterTemplate     Object after(InvocationOnMock invocation int i) {         return invocation.getArgument(i);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `MockitoRules.Never`
description: Prefer `Mockito#never()`} over explicitly specifying that the associated invocation must happen precisely zero times.

name: Refaster template `MockitoRules.VerifyOnce`
description: Prefer `Mockito#verify(Object)` over explicitly specifying that the associated invocation must happen precisely once; this is the default behavior.

name: `MultimapRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `Multimap`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/MultimapRules).

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapContainsKey`
description: Prefer `Multimap#containsKey(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapContainsValue`
description: Prefer `Multimap#containsValue(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Prefer `Multimap#get(Object)` over more contrived alternatives
description: Warning: this rewrite rule is not completely behavior preserving: the original code will yield `null` for unknown keys while the replacement code will return an empty collection for unknown keys.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `Multimap#isEmpty()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapKeySet`
description: Prefer `Multimap#keySet()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapKeysStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily use `Multimap#entries()`.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapSize`
description: Prefer `Multimap#size()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `MultimapRules.MultimapValuesStream`
description: Don't unnecessarily use `Multimap#entries()`.

name: `NullRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with (possibly) null values. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/NullRules).

name: Refaster template `NullRules.IsNotNull`
description: Prefer the `!=` operator (with `null` as the second operand) over `Objects#nonNull(Object)`.

name: Refaster template `NullRules.IsNullFunction`
description: Prefer `Objects#isNull(Object)` over the equivalent lambda function or more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `NullRules.IsNull`
description: Prefer the `==` operator (with `null` as the second operand) over `Objects#isNull(Object)`.

name: Refaster template `NullRules.NonNullFunction`
description: Prefer `Objects#nonNull(Object)` over the equivalent lambda function or more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `NullRules.RequireNonNullElseGet`
description: Prefer `Objects#requireNonNullElseGet(Object Supplier)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `NullRules.RequireNonNullElse`
description: Prefer `Objects#requireNonNullElse(Object Object)` over non-JDK or more contrived alternatives.

name: `OptionalRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `Optional`s. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/OptionalRules).

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.MapOptionalToBoolean`
description: Prefer `Optional#filter(Predicate)` over `Optional#map(Function)` when converting an `Optional` to a boolean.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalEmpty`
description: Prefer `Optional#empty()` over the more contrived alternative.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalEqualsOptional`
description: Prefer `Optional#equals(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalFilter`
description: Avoid unnecessary `Optional` to `Stream` conversion when filtering a value of the former type.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalFirstIteratorElement`
description: Don't use the ternary operator to extract the first element of a possibly-empty `Iterator` as an `Optional`.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalIsEmpty`
description: Prefer `Optional#isEmpty()` over the more verbose alternative.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalIsPresent`
description: Prefer `Optional#isPresent()` over the inverted alternative.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalMap`
description: Avoid unnecessary `Optional` to `Stream` conversion when mapping a value of the former type.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalOfNullable`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class OptionalOfNullable<T> {          @BeforeTemplate     @SuppressWarnings(value = "TernaryOperatorOptionalNegativeFiltering")     Optional<T> before(@Nullable     T object) {         return object == null ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of(object);     }          @AfterTemplate     Optional<T> after(T object) {         return Optional.ofNullable(object);     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalOrElseThrowMethodReference`
description: Prefer `Optional#orElseThrow()` over the less explicit `Optional#get()`.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalOrElseThrow`
description: Prefer `Optional#orElseThrow()` over the less explicit `Optional#get()`.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalOrOtherOptional`
description: Prefer `Optional#or(Supplier)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OptionalStream`
description: Prefer `Optional#stream()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.OrOrElseThrow`
description: Recipe created for the following Refaster template: ```java static final class OrOrElseThrow<T> {          @BeforeTemplate     T before(Optional<T> o1 Optional<T> o2) {         return o1.orElseGet(()->o2.orElseThrow());     }          @AfterTemplate     T after(Optional<T> o1 Optional<T> o2) {         return o1.or(()->o2).orElseThrow();     } } ``` .

name: Refaster template `OptionalRules.StreamFlatMapOptional`
description: Flatten a stream of `Optional`s using `Optional#stream()` rather than using one of the more verbose alternatives.

name: `PatternRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to code dealing with regular expressions. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/PatternRules).

name: Refaster template `PatternRules.PatternAsPredicate`
description: Prefer `Pattern#asPredicate()` over non-JDK alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PatternRules.PatternCompileAsPredicate`
description: Prefer `Pattern#asPredicate()` over non-JDK alternatives.

name: `PreconditionsRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster templates related to statements dealing with `Preconditions`. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/PreconditionsRules).

name: Refaster template `PreconditionsRules.RequireNonNull`
description: Prefer `Objects#requireNonNull(Object)` over non-JDK alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PreconditionsRules.RequireNonNullWithMessage`
description: Prefer `Objects#requireNonNull(Object String)` over non-JDK alternatives.

name: `PrimitiveRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with primitives. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/PrimitiveRules).

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.ArraysCompareUnsignedBytes`
description: Prefer JDK's `Arrays#compareUnsigned(byte[] byte[])` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.ArraysCompareUnsignedInts`
description: Prefer JDK's `Arrays#compareUnsigned(int[] int[])` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.ArraysCompareUnsignedLongs`
description: Prefer JDK's `Arrays#compareUnsigned(long[] long[])` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.CharacterBytes`
description: Prefer `Character#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.DoubleBytes`
description: Prefer `Double#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.FloatBytes`
description: Prefer `Float#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.GreaterThanOrEqualTo`
description: Avoid contrived ways of expressing the "greater than or equal to" relationship.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.GreaterThan`
description: Avoid contrived ways of expressing the "greater than" relationship.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerBytes`
description: Prefer `Integer#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerCompareUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#compareUnsigned(int int)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerDivideUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#divideUnsigned(int int)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerParseUnsignedInt`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#parseUnsignedInt(String)` over third-party or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerParseUnsignedIntWithRadix`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#parseUnsignedInt(String int)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerRemainderUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#remainderUnsigned(int int)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerSignumIsNegative`
description: Prefer an `Integer#signum(int)` comparison to -1 over less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerSignumIsPositive`
description: Prefer an `Integer#signum(int)` comparison to 1 over less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerToUnsignedString`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#toUnsignedString(int)` over third-party or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.IntegerToUnsignedStringWithRadix`
description: Prefer JDK's `Integer#toUnsignedString(intint)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LessThanOrEqualTo`
description: Avoid contrived ways of expressing the "less than or equal to" relationship.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LessThan`
description: Avoid contrived ways of expressing the "less than" relationship.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongBytes`
description: Prefer `Long#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongCompareUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#compareUnsigned(long long)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongDivideUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#divideUnsigned(long long)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongParseUnsignedLong`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#parseUnsignedLong(String)` over third-party or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongParseUnsignedLongWithRadix`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#parseUnsignedLong(String int)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongRemainderUnsigned`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#remainderUnsigned(long long)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongSignumIsNegative`
description: Prefer an `Long#signum(long)` comparison to -1 over less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongSignumIsPositive`
description: Prefer an `Long#signum(long)` comparison to 1 over less clear alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongToIntExact`
description: Prefer `Math#toIntExact(long)` over the Guava alternative.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongToUnsignedString`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#toUnsignedString(long)` over third-party or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.LongToUnsignedStringWithRadix`
description: Prefer JDK's `Long#toUnsignedString(longint)` over third-party alternatives.

name: Refaster template `PrimitiveRules.ShortBytes`
description: Prefer `Short#BYTES` over the Guava alternative.

name: `RandomGeneratorRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to expressions dealing with `RandomGenerator` instances. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/RandomGeneratorRules).

name: Refaster template `RandomGeneratorRules.RandomGeneratorNextDouble`
description: Prefer `RandomGenerator#nextDouble(double)` over alternatives that yield a smaller domain of values and may result in `Double#isInfinite() inifinity`.

name: Refaster template `RandomGeneratorRules.RandomGeneratorNextInt`
description: Prefer `RandomGenerator#nextInt(int)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Prefer `RandomGenerator#nextLong(long)` over more contrived alternatives
description: Additionally for large bounds the unnecessary floating point arithmetic prevents some  `long` values from being generated.

name: `ReactorRules` Refaster recipes
description: Refaster rules related to Reactor expressions and statements. [Source](https://error-prone.picnic.tech/refasterrules/ReactorRules).

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.ConcatMapIterableIdentity`
description: Prefer `Flux#concatMapIterable(Function)` over alternatives that require an additional subscription.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.ConcatMapIterableIdentityWithPrefetch`
description: Prefer `Flux#concatMapIterable(Function int)` over alternatives that require an additional subscription.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxAsStepVerifierExpectNext`
description: Avoid list collection when verifying that a `Flux` emits exactly one value.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxCollectToImmutableList`
description: Prefer `Flux#collect(Collector)` with `ImmutableList#toImmutableList()` over alternatives that do not explicitly return an immutable collection.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxCollectToImmutableSet`
description: Prefer `Flux#collect(Collector)` with `ImmutableSet#toImmutableSet()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxDefaultIfEmpty`
description: Prefer `Flux#defaultIfEmpty(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxDeferredError`
description: Don't unnecessarily defer `Flux#error(Throwable)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxDoOnError`
description: Prefer `Flux#doOnError(Class Consumer)` over `Flux#doOnError(Predicate Consumer)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxErrorSupplier`
description: Don't unnecessarily pass `Flux#error(Supplier)` a method reference or lambda expression.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxFilterSort`
description: Apply `Flux#filter(Predicate)` before `Flux#sort()` to reduce the number of elements to sort.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxFilterSortWithComparator`
description: Apply `Flux#filter(Predicate)` before `Flux#sort(Comparator)` to reduce the number of elements to sort.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxFromIterable`
description: Prefer `Flux#fromIterable(Iterable)` over less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxFromStreamSupplier`
description: Prefer `Flux#fromStream(Supplier)` over `Flux#fromStream(Stream)` as the former yields a `Flux` that is more likely to behave as expected when subscribed to more than once.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxJust`
description: Prefer `Flux#just(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxMapNotNullOrElse`
description: Prefer `Flux#mapNotNull(Function)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxNext`
description: Prefer fluent `Flux#next()` over less explicit alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOfType`
description: Prefer `Flux#ofType(Class)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorCompletePredicate`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorComplete(Predicate)`} over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorComplete`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorComplete()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorContinue`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorContinue(Class BiConsumer)` over `Flux#onErrorContinue(Predicate BiConsumer)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorMap`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorMap(Class Function)` over `Flux#onErrorMap(Predicate Function)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorResume`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorResume(Class Function)` over `Flux#onErrorResume(Predicate Function)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxOnErrorReturn`
description: Prefer `Flux#onErrorReturn(Class Object)` over `Flux#onErrorReturn(Predicate Object)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxSort`
description: Prefer `Flux#sort()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxSwitchIfEmptyOfEmptyPublisher`
description: Don't unnecessarily pass an empty publisher to `Flux#switchIfEmpty(Publisher)`.

name: Prefer `Flux#take(long)` over `Flux#take(long boolean)` where relevant
description: In Reactor versions prior to 3.5.0 `Flux#take(long)` makes an unbounded request  upstream and is equivalent to `Flux#take(long false)`. From version 3.5.0 onwards the  behavior of `Flux#take(long)` instead matches `Flux#take(long true)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxTakeWhile`
description: Do not unnecessarily `Flux#filter(Predicate) filter` the result of `Flux#takeWhile(Predicate)` using the same `Predicate`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxThenEmpty`
description: Avoid vacuous invocations of `Flux#ignoreElements()`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxThenMany`
description: Avoid vacuous invocations of `Flux#ignoreElements()`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxThenMono`
description: Avoid vacuous invocations of `Flux#ignoreElements()`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxThen`
description: Avoid vacuous invocations of `Flux#ignoreElements()`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxTransformMax`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#max(Publisher)` over less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxTransformMaxWithComparator`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#max(Publisher Comparator)` over less efficient or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxTransformMin`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#min(Publisher)` over less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxTransformMinWithComparator`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#min(Publisher Comparator)` over less efficient or more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxZip`
description: Prefer `Flux#zip(Publisher Publisher)` over a chained `Flux#zipWith(Publisher)` as the former better conveys that the `Publisher`s may be subscribed to concurrently and generalizes to combining three or more reactive streams.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxZipWithCombinator`
description: Prefer `Flux#zip(Publisher Publisher)` with a chained combinator over a chained `Flux#zipWith(Publisher BiFunction)` as the former better conveys that the `Publisher`s may be subscribed to concurrently and generalizes to combining three or more reactive streams.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxZipWithIterableBiFunction`
description: Prefer `Flux#zipWithIterable(Iterable BiFunction)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxZipWithIterableMapFunction`
description: Prefer `Flux#zipWithIterable(Iterable)` with a chained combinator over `Flux#zipWithIterable(Iterable BiFunction)` as the former generally yields more readable code.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.FluxZipWithIterable`
description: Prefer `Flux#zipWithIterable(Iterable)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MathFluxMax`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#max(Publisher)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MathFluxMin`
description: Prefer `MathFlux#min(Publisher)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoDefaultIfEmpty`
description: Prefer `Mono#defaultIfEmpty(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoDeferMonoJustOrEmpty`
description: Prefer `Mono#defer(Supplier) deferring` `Mono#justOrEmpty(Optional)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoDeferredError`
description: Don't unnecessarily defer `Mono#error(Throwable)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoDoOnError`
description: Prefer `Mono#doOnError(Class Consumer)` over `Mono#doOnError(Predicate Consumer)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoEmpty`
description: Prefer `Mono#empty()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoErrorSupplier`
description: Don't unnecessarily pass `Mono#error(Supplier)` a method reference or lambda expression.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFlatMapIterableIdentity`
description: Prefer `Mono#flatMapIterable(Function)` to flatten a `Mono` of some `Iterable` over less efficient alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFlux`
description: Prefer `Mono#flux()`} over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFromFutureAsyncLoadingCacheGetAll`
description: Don't propagate `Mono` cancellations to upstream cache value computations as completion of such computations may benefit concurrent or subsequent cache usages.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFromFutureAsyncLoadingCacheGet`
description: Don't propagate `Mono` cancellations to an upstream cache value computation as completion of such computations may benefit concurrent or subsequent cache usages.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFromFutureSupplierBoolean`
description: Prefer `Mono#fromFuture(Supplier boolean)` over `Mono#fromFuture(CompletableFuture boolean)` as the former may defer initiation of the asynchronous computation until subscription.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoFromFutureSupplier`
description: Prefer `Mono#fromFuture(Supplier)` over `Mono#fromFuture(CompletableFuture)` as the former may defer initiation of the asynchronous computation until subscription.

name: Prefer a `Mono#justOrEmpty(Optional)` and `Mono#switchIfEmpty(Mono)` chain over more contrived alternatives
description: In particular avoid mixing of the `Optional` and `Mono` APIs.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoIdentity`
description: Don't unnecessarily transform a `Mono` to an equivalent instance.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoJustOrEmptyObject`
description: Prefer `Mono#justOrEmpty(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoJustOrEmptyOptional`
description: Prefer `Mono#justOrEmpty(Optional)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoJust`
description: Prefer `Mono#just(Object)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOfType`
description: Prefer `Mono#ofType(Class)` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorCompleteClass`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorComplete(Class)`} over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorCompletePredicate`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorComplete(Predicate)`} over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorComplete`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorComplete()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorContinue`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorContinue(Class BiConsumer)` over `Mono#onErrorContinue(Predicate BiConsumer)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorMap`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorMap(Class Function)` over `Mono#onErrorMap(Predicate Function)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorResume`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorResume(Class Function)` over `Mono#onErrorResume(Predicate Function)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoOnErrorReturn`
description: Prefer `Mono#onErrorReturn(Class Object)` over `Mono#onErrorReturn(Predicate Object)` where possible.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoSingleOptional`
description: Prefer `Mono#singleOptional()` over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoSingle`
description: Don't unnecessarily transform a `Mono` to a `Flux` to expect exactly one item.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThenEmpty`
description: Avoid vacuous invocations of `Mono#ignoreElement()`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThenMany`
description: Avoid vacuous operations prior to invocation of `Mono#thenMany(Publisher)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThenMonoFlux`
description: Prefer explicit invocation of `Mono#flux()` over implicit conversions from `Mono` to `Flux`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThenMono`
description: Avoid vacuous operations prior to invocation of `Mono#then(Mono)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThen`
description: Prefer direct invocation of `Mono#then()`} over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoThenReturn`
description: Prefer `Mono#thenReturn(Object)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoZip`
description: Prefer `Mono#zip(Mono Mono)` over a chained `Mono#zipWith(Mono)` as the former better conveys that the `Mono`s may be subscribed to concurrently and generalizes to combining three or more reactive streams.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.MonoZipWithCombinator`
description: Prefer `Mono#zip(Mono Mono)` with a chained combinator over a chained `Mono#zipWith(Mono BiFunction)` as the former better conveys that the `Mono`s may be subscribed to concurrently and generalizes to combining three or more reactive streams.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.OptionalMapMonoJust`
description: Try to avoid expressions of type `Optional<Mono<T>>` but if you must map an `Optional` to this type prefer using `Mono#just(Object)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasCancelled`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasCancelled()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasNotCancelled`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasNotCancelled()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasNotRequested`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasNotRequested()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasNotSubscribed`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasNotSubscribed()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasRequested`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasRequested()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeAssertWasSubscribed`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#assertWasSubscribed()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.PublisherProbeEmpty`
description: Prefer `PublisherProbe#empty()`} over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierFromFlux`
description: Prefer `Flux#as(Function)` when creating a `StepVerifier`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierFromMono`
description: Prefer `Mono#as(Function)` when creating a `StepVerifier`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyComplete`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyComplete()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyErrorClass`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyError(Class)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyErrorMatches`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyErrorMatches(Predicate)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyErrorMessage`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyErrorMessage(String)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyError`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyError()` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyErrorSatisfiesAssertJ`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyErrorSatisfies(Consumer)` with AssertJ over more contrived alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyErrorSatisfies`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyErrorSatisfies(Consumer)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierLastStepVerifyTimeout`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.LastStep#verifyTimeout(Duration)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierStepExpectNext`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier.Step#expectNext(Object)` over more verbose alternatives.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierVerifyDuration`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier#verify(Duration)` over a dangling `StepVerifier#verifyThenAssertThat(Duration)`.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierVerifyLater`
description: Don't unnecessarily invoke `StepVerifier#verifyLater()` multiple times.

name: Refaster template `ReactorRules.StepVerifierVerify`
description: Prefer `StepVerifier#verify()` over a dangling `StepVerifier#verifyThenAssertThat()`.

name: `RxJava2AdapterRules` Refaster recipes

name: Refaster template `RxJava2AdapterRules.CompletableToMono`

name: Refaster template `RxJava2AdapterRules.FlowableToFlux`

description: Use `RxJava2Adapter#fluxToFlowable` to convert a `Flux` to a `Flowable` and do so using the fluent API style.

description: Use `RxJava2Adapter#fluxToObservable` to convert a `Flux` to a `Observable` and do so using the fluent API style.

name: Refaster template `RxJava2AdapterRules.MonoToCompletable`

name: Refaster template `RxJava2AdapterRules.MonoToFlowable`
